about_the_game:
Extend your adventure in the magical world of "Royal Romances: Fortunes and Foes" with this captivating DLC! Journey through four additional, intricately designed locations that reveal deeper secrets about the kingdom, its characters, and the unfolding storyline. Discover new puzzles, mini-games, and hidden objects as you dive deeper into this fabulous world. The DLC offers a thrilling continuation of your adventure, filled with engaging activities and enchanting details that enrich the game!

This extension offers more locations, more achievements and more adventures, allowing you to further immerse yourself in the magic and romance! Whether you’re discovering new truths or solving ancient mysteries, this DLC will captivate and engage you with every new detail.

💋 THE FORTUNE TELLER!

Enter the shadowy tent of the mysterious fortune teller, where the air is thick with intrigue. As you sit before her, she reveals clues about the fate of Glissando. The faint light from behind her cloth curtain adds to the suspense. Will her words guide you or trick you?

💋 THE BEAUTIFUL PYTHIA HOUSE!

Step inside the incredibly beautiful Pythia House, filled with mesmerizing decor and rich atmosphere. However, this is no ordinary house – it holds the secret of the Pythia fan, which you must piece together through intricate puzzles!

💋 THE MEMORIES FROM THE PAST!

Journey through the abandoned village and forgotten mill to uncover the truth behind the mysterious Stone of Memories. This powerful artifact holds the key to understanding what really happened in the village, but only if you can navigate its complex surroundings!

💋 THE MYSTERY OF THE WINE CELLAR!

While exploring a seemingly ordinary wine cellar, you stumble upon clues that could help the circus troupe recover their lost fortune. But the cellar is filled with more than just barrels of wine – mini-games and puzzles will lead you to hidden secrets!

Deepen your connection to the kingdom and its characters! Each new location is designed with beautiful scenery, intricate details, and more thrilling challenges at every turn.
